special_abilities.name: Enchanting Presence.
special_abilities.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin’s Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4 – 6)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The eladrin’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Longsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow.
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Foster Peace.
reactions.desc: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.
